channel.title: Help with shops
channel.description:
I know i have to go into shops.cfg and do something like
shop-1 shop name" and im lost after that...
also, how do i spawn the npc that im placing the shop in?
I have searched and searched, an i know there are a lot of tuts, but im still kind of confused. Thanks in advance!

item.title: Help with shops
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

mmaKush:

It was an example, and the gold coins ID popped in my head first.

LOL

[quote=“jal knight, post:7, topic:348896”]lol i didnt even notice that :p.
But Thanks guys i got that to work, but i have one little problem…

Anytime i level up in theiving it lags me out. not the server just the person using the client. It doesnt disconnect them because on the server cmd it doesnt show it untill i close the client. when i use the ::master command and theiv i don lag out (probably because im 99 theiving) so, can you please help?! D: its so annoying because everyone likes the stalls. If you can help me fix this i will rep as much as i ca untill i break a finger from clicking so much!![/quote]
You can’t rep lol…

jal knight:

alrighty, wel if anyone else thinks they can help tonight i will appreciate that to

I might be able to help when I finish my own server.[quote=“mmaKush, post:12, topic:348896”]I’m telling you that, unless you have A LOT of other code placed within your process() method, I wouldn’t understand why when you thieve from a stall, it lags your player(s) client’s. I’d have to go deeper in the problem.[/quote]
He means that you need to search for process() method in your client.java Then, see how many codes you have in there. Lol. Thats as nooby as I can get for you to break it down

Read full topic

item.title: Help with shops
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

This?

}
public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
actionInterval = 4000;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
setAnimation(emote);
sM(“You take from the stall…”);
sM(message);
addItem(item, itemAmount);
addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
}
else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
sM(“You need a theiving level of “+lvlReq+” to theif from this stall.”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Help with shops

item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

lol i didnt even notice that :p.
But Thanks guys i got that to work, but i have one little problem…

Anytime i level up in theiving it lags me out. not the server just the person using the client. It doesnt disconnect them because on the server cmd it doesnt show it untill i close the client. when i use the ::master command and theiv i don lag out (probably because im 99 theiving) so, can you please help?! D: its so annoying because everyone likes the stalls. If you can help me fix this i will rep as much as i ca untill i break a finger from clicking so much!!
